arts.ttl: Who is Josh Acheampong? The Chelsea wonderkid wanted by Real Madrid and PSG
arts.sum: The teenager is widely regarded as one of England’s most exciting young defenders and his development is being watched by numerous elite clubs amid his uncertain future at Chelsea. In October 2024, amid Acheampong’s contract standoff with Chelsea, Maresca told reporters: “I really think that Josh, potentially, can be a top player.

arts.ttl: PSG Have Terrifying Stat Under Luis Enrique After Draw to AJ Auxerre
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain and AJ Auxerre played to a 0-0 draw on Friday night at Stade de l’Abbé-Deschamps. While the match lacked goals, Donovan Léon delivered an outstanding performance in goal to frustrate PSG. PSG dominated the first half, registering seven shots on target compared to Auxerre’s one.
